search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for MindManager (mindmanager-enterprise.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I found the official pricing page link for MindManager. Please check the following URL: https://www.mindmanager.com/en/pricing/  .

extracted_content.content:

MindManager Pricing
===================

Visualize your path to success. Choose the plan that's right for you.

[Try it free](https://www.mindmanager.com/en/product/mindmanager/trial-thank-you-download/)

![Image 4: Essentials](https://www.mindmanager.com/static/mm/images/pages/pricing/icon-user.svg)Essentials

The **web version** of MindManager for individual projects and productivity.

$99.00/year  
(incl. VAT)

[Buy now](https://store.mindmanager.com/1494/purl-ESDMMESSUB12) [Learn more](https://www.mindmanager.com/en/product/mindmanager/essentials/)

Best Value

![Image 5: MindManager Annual Plan](https://www.mindmanager.com/static/mm/images/pages/pricing/icon-proffesional.svg)Professional

The **complete MindManager experience** for individuals and small teams. Get all the newest versions, the full suite of features, collaboration tools, and more!

**NEW** enhanced Gantt capabilities, contextual toolbar, and more!

Save 28%

$179.00 $129.00/year  
(incl. VAT)

[Buy now](https://store.mindmanager.com/1494/purl-ESDMMWMSUB1Y) [Learn more](https://www.mindmanager.com/en/product/mindmanager/) [One-time purchase](https://www.mindmanager.com/en/product/mindmanager/?segid=perp)

![Image 6: MindManager Enterprise](https://www.mindmanager.com/static/mm/images/pages/pricing/icon-enterprise-new.svg)Enterprise

Special benefits for teams, enterprises, governments, nonprofits, and educational institutions, with **complete IT administration capabilities.**

**Special pricing available**

[Get a quote](https://www.mindmanager.com/include/en/modals/modal-demo.html) [Learn more](https://www.mindmanager.com/en/product/mindmanager/enterprise/) [Enterprise trial](https://www.mindmanager.com/include/en/modals/modal-free-trial.html)

![Image 7: MindManager for Microsoft Teams](https://www.mindmanager.com/static/mm/images/pages/pricing/icon-teams-new.png)

### MindManager for Microsoft Teams

Equip your team for seamless collaboration and success.

[Learn more](https://www.mindmanager.com/en/product/mindmanager/teams/)

![Image 8: MindManager for Students and Educators](https://www.mindmanager.com/static/mm/images/pages/pricing/icon-edu.png)

### MindManager for Students and Educators

The student and educator version of MindManager for individual projects and productivity in the classroom.

[Learn more](https://www.mindmanager.com/en/product/mindmanager/education/)

Privacy Preference Center
-------------------------

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[More information](https://cookiepedia.co.uk/giving-consent-to-cookies)

Allow All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.    All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

View Vendor Details‎

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.    If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

View Vendor Details‎

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.    You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

View Vendor Details‎

#### Targeting Cookies

 Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.    They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

View Vendor Details‎

### Vendors List
